        SingleSurroundingBlock makeIfBlock()

                  SequenceBlock bodyBlock)
           throws java.lang.Exception
        Parameters:
        surroundingBlock - Is a block of the type SurroundingBlock.
        bodyBlock - Is a block of the type SequenceBlock.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If bodyBlock is not the first one of a group of blocks.

      • getNextBlock

        Block getNextBlock​(Block block)
        Parameters:
        block -
        Returns:
        The block that is connected after this block (on the right side for conditionBlocks or on the down side of sequenceBlocks).

      • getPreviousBlock

        Block getPreviousBlock​(Block block)
        Parameters:
        block -
        Returns:
        The block that is connected before this block (on the left side for conditionBlocks or on the upper side of sequenceBlocks).

      • getLastBlock

        Block getLastBlock​(Block block)
        Parameters:
        block -
        Returns:
        the last block of the group of blocks where block is a part of.

      • getConditionBlock

        ConditionBlock getConditionBlock​(SurroundingBlock block)
        Parameters:
        block -
        Returns:
        Returns the first condition block (might be of a sequence accessible by block.next()).

        Parameters:

      • isValidStartingBlock

        Parameters:
        block -
        Returns:
